headline: GRANVILLE PHILLIPS 360
description: Multiple Gauge Controller    Dual ion gauge, dual convectron gauges with 360107 process control and Stabil-ion remote control capable.
specstable:
Manufacturer Granville Phil
Model 360
Description Dual Ion/Dual Convectron Controller/ Process control
Gauge Types Controlled Ion; Convectron
Cables Included No
Accessories

Contains modules:

360107 for process control, 6 setpoints, 2 per channel
360106 for dual convectron gauges
360104 for Stabil-ion remote control

360110 for RS232


Gauges are not included

Other Information

This controller uses the high accuracy STABIL-ION Gauge
Features and controls: Two STABIL-ION gauges in sequential operation
Two Convectron gauges
Electron Beam Degas
I/O Remote
STABIL-ION Remote
Controller and power supply in side-by-side 19" rack configuration

This controller can be calibrated for different ion gauges, calibration for each channel is loaded via memory modules.

  • If you have standard Bayard-Alpert glass gauge, CBI can upload average calibration for that gauge with sensitivity 10/Torr to channel one, two or both.
  • If you have Stabil-Ion gauge with individual module containing calibration for that gauge, you should upload that to the controller before using it.
  • If you have Stabil-Ion gauge without individual module, CBI can upload average calibration with sensitivity 50/Torr to channel one, two or both.

Specify type and sensitivity of your gauges and input power 115VAC or 230VAC when ordering.
Click here for the manual

Condition Excellent
Power Requirements 115/ 230 V 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 19.000 in (48.3 cm)
Depth 10.000 in (25.4 cm)
Height 3.500 in (8.9 cm)
Weight 16 lb (7 kg)
